fields.default: To initiate a partial or complete return of an order, please contact us so we can start the return process. Don’t forget to include the order number and the reason for returning.

fields.default: Back to order | Back to orders

fields.label: Returns info text
fields.default: Contact us, so we can start the return process. Don’t forget to include the order number and the reason for returning.

fields.label: Active status message
fields.default: You can edit your plan or order items until this time. We’ll ship your order the next day.

fields.label: Subscription status
fields.default: Your subscription has been paused. You can resume your subscription below.

fields.label: Paused status message
fields.default: Your subscription has been paused, but scheduled to resume. You can still change when your subscription resumes below.

fields.label: Canceled status message
fields.default: Your subscription has been cancellled and is unable to be reactivated.

fields.label: Trial status message
fields.default: You can edit your plan or order items until this time. We’ll ship your order the next day.

fields.default: You haven't subscribed to any products yet.

fields.label: Orders list empty state link label
Trial period end message
fields.default: Your trial period will end in {n} {interval}

fields.label: Pause subscription message
fields.default: We get it. Sometimes we all need to snooze and sleep in. Pause your subscription before the next billing cycle and you won’t get charged.

fields.label: Pause subscription popup message
fields.default: We all need a break from time to time. You can also skip the next cycle and continue with your subscription.

fields.label: Pause subscription popup pause now option
Pause subscription popup skip cycle option
Skip cycle success
fields.default: Your subscription will skip the next cycle.

fields.label: Resume subscription message
fields.default: You paused your subscription on {date}. You can resume your subscription now or choose a specific date.

fields.label: Resume subscription popup message
fields.default: Resume your subscription now or choose a date and time. If you choose a different date, you’ll be billed on that day.

fields.label: Resume subscription popup resume now option
Resume subscription popup choose date option

fields.label: Change frequency popup text
